title: zk init: error: failed to load manifest for dependency `zksync_crypto`
body:
Followed the setup guide and installed everything. 

However, when i tried running `zk init` i get the following error:
```
adamma@Adams-MacBook-Pro zksync % zk init

-------------------------
> Creating docker volumes
‚úî Creating docker volumes done (19ms)

----------------
> Pulling images
Pulling postgres                    ... done
Pulling geth                        ... done
Pulling dev-liquidity-token-watcher ... done
Pulling dev-ticker                  ... done
‚úî Pulling images done (3106ms)

----------------------
> Checking environment
‚úî Checking environment done (160ms)

--------------------
> Checking git hooks
‚úî Checking git hooks done (11ms)

-----------------------
> Setting up containers
zksync_dev-ticker_1 is up-to-date
zksync_postgres_1 is up-to-date
Starting zksync_dev-liquidity-token-watcher_1 ... 
Starting zksync_dev-liquidity-token-watcher_1 ... done
‚úî Setting up containers done (1090ms)

-----------------------
> Compiling JS packages
yarn install v1.22.19
[1/4] üîç  Resolving packages...
success Already up-to-date.
‚ú®  Done in 0.34s.
yarn run v1.22.19
$ yarn crypto build
$ yarn workspace zksync-crypto build
warning package.json: No license field
$ ./build.sh && node web-wasm.js
/Users/adamma/.yarn/bin/wasm-pack
Error: `cargo metadata` exited with an error: error: failed to load manifest for dependency `zksync_crypto`

Caused by:
  failed to parse manifest at `/Users/adamma/Desktop/zksync_master/zksync/Cargo.toml`

Caused by:
  missing field `name` for key `package`

Caused by: `cargo metadata` exited with an error: error: failed to load manifest for dependency `zksync_crypto`

Caused by:
  failed to parse manifest at `/Users/adamma/Desktop/zksync_master/zksync/Cargo.toml`

Caused by:
  missing field `name` for key `package`

error Command failed with exit code 1.
info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command.
error Command failed.
Exit code: 1
Command: /usr/local/bin/node
Arguments: /Users/adamma/.yarn/lib/cli.js build
Directory: /Users/adamma/Desktop/zksync_master/zksync/sdk/zksync-crypto
Output:

info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/workspace for documentation about this command.
error Command failed with exit code 1.
info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command.
error Command failed with exit code 1.
info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command.
Error: Child process exited with code 1
`
```
I didnt edit any `Cargo.toml` files but it is saying `zksync/Cargo.toml` is missing things. 

Has anyone else experienced this issue?
